contents.text: Welcome to Zendesk, the cloud-based customer service platform trusted by over 200,000 organizations worldwide.
For sales and pricing information, press 1.
To inquire about purchasing a new subscription, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Obtain a quote and purchase a new Zendesk subscription for my team.
Ask about pricing and veteran discounts for a new Zendesk subscription
I want to compare subscription tiers and get enterprise pricing details for a new Zendesk plan.
I’d like to purchase a new Zendesk subscription and understand the pricing options.
I’d like to explore subscription options for a personal student plan to manage my lab inquiries next semester.

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify unexpected charges on my latest Zendesk invoice.
Review my billing statement and inquire about applying a military discount
I need to review my recent invoice charges and update my billing payment method.
I have questions about my recent bill and need help with my account’s billing details.
I have questions about my current billing statement and need to verify the charges on my account.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
If you are experiencing issues with ticket submission, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot why tickets won’t submit in my Zendesk account.
Resolve an error I'm getting when submitting support tickets
I'm encountering a 400 Bad Request error when submitting tickets via the API and need troubleshooting.
I’m unable to submit a support ticket and need assistance with the ticket submission process.
I’m experiencing issues submitting new support tickets and need assistance troubleshooting the error.

contents.text: For integration and API assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our integrations specialist.

navigationGoals: Configure Zendesk API integration with our internal tools.
Set up Zendesk API integration with my existing veteran support system
I need help configuring OAuth authentication and webhook integrations for the Zendesk API.
I need help configuring Zendesk’s integration and API for my system.
I need help integrating the Zendesk API with our laboratory management software for automated ticket tracking.
